title: ewb随身工作台指令的权限
author: 爱神
txt_content: 我不知道ewb是哪个插件的，看起来像是ess的，那它的权限是什么？ec随身末影箱呢？？

replies.author: Mieo
replies.txt_content:
essentials.workbench -权限
/workbench -随时随地召唤出一个工作台界面

replies.author: Mieo
replies.txt_content:
essentials.workbench -权限
/workbench -随时随地召唤出一个工作台界面

replies.author: 爱神
replies.txt_content:
Mieo 发表于 2015-5-16 17:20
essentials.workbench -权限
/workbench -随时随地召唤出一个工作台界面
谢谢，那末影箱ec呢

replies.author: Mieo
replies.txt_content:
爱神 发表于 2015-5-16 18:46
谢谢，那末影箱ec呢
ess.echest 权限
/echest 指令

replies.author: 爱神
replies.txt_content:

ess.echest 权限

太谢谢了
